jobDescription: Company Overview Our client is implementing Transportation and Warehouse Management Systems as part of Global Logistics Automation . The overall goal of TMS program is to consolidate shipments across multiple locations for cost savings opportunities & to reduce manual work in warehouses. Job Summary The data analyst will use our client Transportation Systems to identify missing master data ( item master - item weights and dims , location master ) etc and work with 3PLs and our client internal teams to capture and load master data into TMS System . Responsibilities and DutiesCollect, document and master data to TMS systemUpdate & Manage master data ( Location Master, items weights etc)Work with 3 PL to capture Master data requirementsQualifications and SkillsBA or BS in any field but not mandatoryMinimum of 2 years of experience in working with master data in TMS systems & warehousing experienceAbility to identify Master data discripenciesKnowledge in Excel
